Please take another look.

http://codereview.appspot.com/5820048/diff/3/doc/articles/error_handling.html File doc/articles/error_handling.html (right): http://codereview.appspot.com/5820048/diff/3/doc/articles/error_handling.html#newcode262 doc/articles/error_handling.html:262: see Why is my nil error value not equal to nil?, for reasons discussed in the Go FAQ
